column2: $9.25 prior to tax- I asked for the dressing (balsamic dressing) to be on the side
column3: which is how it came. This salad was a good size for 2 people to share and came with thinly sliced pears (added a nice sweet taste)
column4: some crumbled goat cheese and sliced red onions. I thought this salad was good
column5: but would have preferred grilled onions.
